title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 191.3 - Payment for forest fire fighters and equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 191.3 - Payment for forest fire fighters and equipment

State Regulations
(a) The following shall be the wages paid by
the department to persons other than its regular employees who are employed by
the department to suppress forest fires: (1)
fire warden--$3 per hour; (2)
foreman--$2.25 per hour; (3)
equipment operator--the rate paid for such work in the locality in which the
person is employed to suppress the fire, as determined by the
department; (4)
fire fighter--$1.75
per hour. (b) The owner
of automotive equipment, aircraft or teams of horses hired to suppress forest
fires shall be paid at a rate not to exceed that paid for such services in the
locality in which such services are hired, as determined by the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
191.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
